title: POS0980 EXPLORING THE RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN SKIN DISEASE ACTIVITY AND THE PASDAS IN PSORIATIC ARTHRITIS
details: MLM Mulder, GT Jones, O Rotariu, PS Helliwell - 2024
abstract: Background: The Psoriatic Arthritis Disease Activity Score (PASDAS) is a composite measure for psoriatic arthritis (PsA) encompassing arthritis, enthesitis, dactylitis, CRP, physician and patient global visual analogue scale (VAS) scores, and patient …

title: Managing skin disease with fluorescence biomodulation
abstract: Fluorescence biomodulation (FBM) is a form of low-level laser therapy (LLLT) that is now gaining in popularity as a viable option for treating certain conditions in veterinary medicine. In general, LLLT methods typically employ photons of various …
